content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I used the \'google\' command with the query "popular travel destinations" to gather more information. My computer returned a list of hyperlinks from various sources including travel.usnews.com, forbes.com, travelandleisure.com, cnn.com, tripadvisor.com, money.com, and united.com. When I used the \'get_hyperlinks\' command to access the hyperlink for travel.usnews.com, my computer returned too much output and advised me not to execute the command again with the same arguments. Instead, I used the \'browse_website\' command with the URL "https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/worlds-best-vacations/" and asked the question "What are the top 10 travel destinations according to this website?"'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to the website, the top 10 travel destinations are Paris, Bora Bora, Glacier National Park, Rome, Swiss Alps, Maui, London, Maldives, Turks & Caicos, and Tokyo. The text also provides a list of 30 top travel destinations, but does not rank them from 1 to 30. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.usnews.com)', 'Travel (https://travel.usnews.com/)', 'Home (https://travel.usnews.com/)', 'Vacations (https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/)', 'Travel Guides (https://travel.usnews.com/destinations/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.usnews.com/travel/news/articles/2021-12-07/the-30-best-places-to-visit-in-2022-according-to-us-news-world-report", "question": "What are some things to do in the top 10 travel destinations mentioned in the article?"}}}'}]
"""
